Description: Light-weight C++ XML processing library pugixml is a lightweight C++ XML processing library with XPath support. It features: * DOM like interface with rich traversal/modification capabilities * Extermely fast non-validating XML parser which constructs the DOM tree from an XML file/buffer. * XPath 1.0 implementation for complex data-driven tree queries * Full Unicode support with Unicode interface variants and automatic encoding conversions.
Package-List: libpugixml-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libpugixml1v5 deb libs optional arch=any pugixml-doc deb doc optional arch=all
